description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Dublin, Ireland. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Five-Star Dublin Escape with a Heavenly Day Spa
hotels.description: Be warmly welcomed in five-star style at the InterContinental Dublin, an IHG Hotel, where old-school charms met with modern luxury. Make use of the exquisite day spa with relaxing treatments, a sauna and an indoor heated swimming pool. Be treated to exemplary service and listen to the soft sounds of a grand piano in the Lobby Lounge over a glass of wine, and feast on mouthwatering Irish cuisine at Seasons Restaurant. When you're ready to explore, Dublin's city centre is just a short drive away.

hotels.title: Dublin Parkside Hotel near Airport
hotels.description: Overlooking the soothing greenery of Santry Park, Crowne Plaza Dublin Airport, an IHG Hotel, is a relaxing haven only minutes from the airport. Take a soothing stroll across leafy lawns, or embark on a journey into Dublin to visit iconic distilleries, captivating museums and exhibitions. Enjoy enticing dishes at the onsite Touzai restaurant or kick back with a cool cocktail or cold pint at the Cinnabar Social bar. At day's end, retire to a welcoming and vibrant guest room for a well-earned rest.

hotels.title: Stylish West Dublin Stay Close to City, Airport & Blanchardstown Centre Shopping
hotels.description: Experience the perfect combination of heritage and cosmopolitan living in Dublin at Crowne Plaza Dublin-Blanchardstown, an IHG Hotel. Just 15 minutes from the airport and city centre, you'll be within easy reach of the classic cobblestoned streets lined with vintage bookstores and boutiques, and the endless local pubs for a pint of Guinness. Near the hotel is the Blanchardstown Centre, the perfect place to indulge in some retail therapy.

hotels.title: Five-Star Boutique Dublin Heritage Escape
hotels.description: Discover the warm spirit and vibrant culture of Dublin, staying in five-star luxury at the historic Dylan Hotel. Housed in the former nurses' home for the Royal City of Dublin Hospital, this urban hotel effortlessly marries the building’s unique history and Victorian features with modern luxuries and boutique comforts. Nestled on a Victorian street in one of the city’s most sophisticated quarters, the hotel places you in an enviable location south of the river, within walking distance of popular Baggot Street’s pubs, shops and restaurants, and a 30-minute stroll from the city centre. (test) Behind the red-brick façade, a world of marble floors, heritage touches and Irish design awaits. Luxe facilities include The Eddison - an elegant restaurant with sunny verandas serving traditional Irish food - and the intimate Dylan Bar, the ideal place to enjoy carefully crafted cocktails and modern brunch fare. In summer, The Nurserie Terrace comes alive with spirited guests enjoying cool glasses of rosé. Each evening, cosy up in your boutique room or suite, offering luxe touches such as Nespresso coffee machines and a 'Good Food Ireland' hospitality tray with local treats. **Luxury Escapes inclusions (select packages)**: - **Daily à la carte breakfast** at The Eddison, serving pancakes, French toast and more - A **signature cocktail, glass of wine or beer on arrival** to celebrate your escape - **One three-course dinner** for two at The Eddison (stays of 3+ nights) - **Upgrade to the next room category**, subject to availability (stays of 5+ nights) **Want to elevate your stay?** Upgrade to a beautifully designed Experience Suite, with a lounge area, custom-made furniture and Irish-designed fabrics.
